1.1 log @Install extension [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-menu-ui/10.9] @ text @<?xml version='1.1' encoding='UTF-8'?> <xwikidoc version="1.3" reference="Menu.MenuTranslations" locale="de"> <web>Menu</web> <name>MenuTranslations</name> <language>de</language> <defaultLanguage>en</defaultLanguage> <translation>1</translation> <creator>XWiki.SvenHoyer</creator> <creationDate>1542794877862</creationDate> <parent>MenuClass</parent> <author>XWiki.SvenHoyer</author> <contentAuthor>XWiki.SvenHoyer</contentAuthor> <date>1542794877000</date> <contentUpdateDate>1542794877000</contentUpdateDate> <version>1.1</version> <title/> <comment>Install extension [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-menu-ui/10.9]</comment> <minorEdit>false</minorEdit> <syntaxId>plain/1.0</syntaxId> <hidden>true</hidden> <content># Class fields Menu.MenuClass_content1=Menüstruktur
# Live table generic keys menu.livetable.doc.title=Seitentitel menu.livetable.doc.name=Seitenname menu.livetable.doc.location=Speicherort menu.livetable.doc.space=Bereich menu.livetable.doc.fullname=Vollständiger Seitenname menu.livetable.doc.author=Letzter Autor menu.livetable.doc.creator=Ersteller menu.livetable.doc.date=Bearbeitungsdatum menu.livetable.doc.creationDate=Erstellungsdatum menu.livetable._avatar=Profilbild menu.livetable._images=Bilder menu.livetable._attachments=Anhänge menu.livetable._actions=Aktionen menu.livetable._actions.edit=Bearbeiten menu.livetable._actions.delete=Löschen menu.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys menu.livetable.content1=Menüstruktur
# Administration keys admin.menu.name=Menü
# UIX keys menu.uix.extensionPoint.label=Menü Anzeigeposition menu.uix.extensionPoint.hint=Gibt an, wo das Menü angezeigt werden soll. Das Menü wird entweder horizontal oder vertikal angezeigt, abhängig vom gewählten Ort. menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.nowhere=Nirgends menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.template.header.after=Nach dem Seitenkopf menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.rightPanels=In einem rechten Panel menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.leftPanels=In einem linken Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.content.label=UI Extension Content ### Missing: menu.uix.content.hint=If you can see this then it probably means you have JavaScript disabled. You should select the same value as for the menu display location. menu.uix.scope.label=Menü Sichtbarkeit Geltungsbereich menu.uix.scope.hint=Legt fest, in welchem Kontext das Menü sichtbar ist.
# Menu Macro rendering.macro.menu.name=Menü ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.description=Displays a menu created using simple wiki syntax (nested lists and links). rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.name=id ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.description=Optional menu identifier that will be set on the HTML element that wraps the menu. You can use this identifier in JavaScript code to access the menu DOM or in functional tests to assert the menu items. rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.name=Typ ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.description=The optional menu type determines the menu appearance and behaviour. The supported values are: horizontal (default value) and vertical. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.content.description=Define the menu structure using wiki syntax. Each menu item should be a list item and should contain the menu item label or link. You can use nested lists for sub-menu items.
# Menu WebHome ### Missing: menu.description=This is a simple application that helps you create navigation menus to be displayed either horizontally as a top bar after the page header or vertically in a side panel.</content> </xwikidoc>@
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.SvenHoyer
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields Menu.MenuClass_content1=Menüstruktur
# Live table generic keys menu.livetable.doc.title=Seitentitel menu.livetable.doc.name=Seitenname menu.livetable.doc.location=Speicherort menu.livetable.doc.space=Bereich menu.livetable.doc.fullname=Vollständiger Seitenname menu.livetable.doc.author=Letzter Autor menu.livetable.doc.creator=Ersteller menu.livetable.doc.date=Bearbeitungsdatum menu.livetable.doc.creationDate=Erstellungsdatum menu.livetable._avatar=Profilbild menu.livetable._images=Bilder menu.livetable._attachments=Anhänge menu.livetable._actions=Aktionen menu.livetable._actions.edit=Bearbeiten menu.livetable._actions.delete=Löschen menu.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys menu.livetable.content1=Menüstruktur
# Administration keys admin.menu.name=Menü
# UIX keys menu.uix.extensionPoint.label=Menü Anzeigeposition menu.uix.extensionPoint.hint=Gibt an, wo das Menü angezeigt werden soll. Das Menü wird entweder horizontal oder vertikal angezeigt, abhängig vom gewählten Ort. menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.nowhere=Nirgends menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.template.header.after=Nach dem Seitenkopf menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.rightPanels=In einem rechten Panel menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.leftPanels=In einem linken Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.content.label=UI Extension Content ### Missing: menu.uix.content.hint=If you can see this then it probably means you have JavaScript disabled. You should select the same value as for the menu display location. menu.uix.scope.label=Menü Sichtbarkeit Geltungsbereich menu.uix.scope.hint=Legt fest, in welchem Kontext das Menü sichtbar ist.
# Menu Macro rendering.macro.menu.name=Menü ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.description=Displays a menu created using simple wiki syntax (nested lists and links). rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.name=id ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.description=Optional menu identifier that will be set on the HTML element that wraps the menu. You can use this identifier in JavaScript code to access the menu DOM or in functional tests to assert the menu items. rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.name=Typ ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.description=The optional menu type determines the menu appearance and behaviour. The supported values are: horizontal (default value) and vertical. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.content.description=Define the menu structure using wiki syntax. Each menu item should be a list item and should contain the menu item label or link. You can use nested lists for sub-menu items.
# Menu WebHome ### Missing: menu.description=This is a simple application that helps you create navigation menus to be displayed either horizontally as a top bar after the page header or vertically in a side panel.
